text: (he nabee!) kaho ki he ahle kitaab! ek aisee baat kee or aa jao, jo hamaare tatha tumhaare beech samaan roop se maany hai ki allaah ke siva kisee kee ibaadat (vandana) na karen aur kisee ko usaka saajhee na banaayen tatha hamamen se koee ek-doosare ko allaah ke siva paalanahaar na banaaye. phir yadi ve vimukh hon, to aap kah den ki tum saakshee raho ki ham (allaah ke)[1] aagyaakaaree hain
